snippet: Dwyane Wade, who figured the Knicks’ focus on LeBron James would leave openings for him, scored 25 points for the Heat.
abstract: Miami Heat guard Dwyane Wade, who figured that New York Knicks focus on Heat forward LeBron James would leave openings for him, scores 25 points in Game 2 victory over New York.
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade, who figured the Knicks’ focus on LeBron James would leave openings for him, scored 25 points for the Heat.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs: Dwyane Wade Takes Advantage of Chances
headline.main: Wade Takes Advantage of His Many Chances
